item.title: 荷兰银行称中国风力涡轮机在欧洲尚不可行
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN AMRO Bank NV）负责项目和基础设施融资的董事总经理丽莎-麦克德莫特（Lisa McDermott）表示，如果欧洲的风电场选择使用可能更便宜的中国风力涡轮机，那么向其提供贷款还不可行。【原文：It’s not yet viable to lend money to a wind farm in Europe that opts to use potentially cheaper Chinese wind turbines, according to Lisa McDermott, managing director for project and infrastructure finance, at ABN AMRO Bank NV.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔担心特朗普胜选后经济增长放缓、通胀加快
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔警告说，如果唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统连任，欧洲经济可能会面临明显的增长放缓和通货膨胀加剧。【原文：Europe’s economy could face significantly less growth and more inflation, should Donald Trump win re-election as US president, European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel warned.】

item.title: OpenAI 与赫斯特达成协议，为 ChatGPT 提供新闻内容
item.description: OpenAI 与赫斯特通讯公司（Hearst Communications Inc.【原文：OpenAI and Hearst Communications Inc. have struck a deal to bring content from the publisher’s suite of magazines and newspapers into chatbot ChatGPT, adding to a long list of partnerships the artificial intelligence startup has inked with media companies.】

item.title: 2025 年美国石油产量增速将超预期放缓
item.description: 美国预计明年的原油日产量仅增长 32 万桶，远低于此前的估计。【原文：The US expects crude production to grow by just 320,000 barrels a day next year, much slower than previously estimated.】

item.title: 美联储降息，布雷万创下 2022 年以来最佳月度回报率
item.description: Brevan Howard 资产管理公司 9 月份的回报率为 5.1%，是自 2022 年以来的最佳月度回报率，原因是美联储的降息幅度超出了一些交易员的预期。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management returned 5.1% in September, its best monthly return since 2022, as the Federal Reserve cut interest rates more than some traders expected.】

item.title: 银行出售 10 亿美元贷款为收购 Jaggaer 提供资金
item.description: 以瑞士联合银行集团（UBS Group AG）为首的银行出售了 10 亿美元的杠杆贷款，为 Vista Equity Partners 收购软件公司 Jaggaer 提供资金，这是市场上最新一笔包含第二借款成分的收购交易。【原文：Banks led by UBS Group AG sold $1 billion of leveraged loans to help finance Vista Equity Partners’ buyout of software company Jaggaer, the market’s latest acquisition deal to include a second-lien component.】

item.title: Ares 的 deVeer 认为美联储降息将催化未来的交易流
item.description: Ares Management Corp 信贷部主管基普-德维尔（Kipp deVeer）表示，虽然美联储降息可能会降低所有浮动利率信贷的回报率，但宽松周期仍将成为交易的催化剂。【原文：While the Federal Reserve’s rate cuts may soften returns in all of floating-rate credit, the easing cycle will nonetheless be a catalyst for deals, said Kipp deVeer, head of the credit group at Ares Management Corp.】

item.title: 随着飓风米尔顿逼近佛罗里达，保险公司对海伦损失的估计不断攀升
item.description: 飓风 "海伦 "造成的保险损失估计已攀升至 140 亿美元之多，而保险公司正准备应对飓风 "米尔顿 "造成的更大破坏。【原文：Estimates for insured losses from Hurricane Helene have climbed to as much as $14 billion, even as insurers are preparing for more devastation from Hurricane Milton.】

item.title: 伊朗仍在从关键的哈格岛码头运送原油
item.description: 伊朗仍在从其主要的哈格岛码头出口原油，即使在一队油轮逃离附近水域之后也是如此。【原文：Iran is still exporting crude from its main Kharg Island terminal even after a flotilla of tankers fled nearby waters where they’d normally wait their turn to collect cargoes.】

item.title: 收购 "悬念 "令穆巴达拉炼油厂债券持有人不安
item.description: 穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）拥有的炼油厂运营商阿塞伦公司（Acelen）的投资者正在失去耐心，因为可能出售给巴西国有石油公司巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）的谈判正在拖延。【原文：Investors in Acelen, the oil refinery operator owned by Mubadala Capital, are losing their patience as talks for a potential sale to Brazil’s state-controlled oil firm Petroleo Brasileiro SA drag on.】

item.title: 大豆、豆油下跌，中国经济刺激政策乏力打击大宗商品
item.description: 由于中国缺乏新的刺激措施，引发了整个市场的抛售，大豆和豆油期货下滑。【原文：Futures for soybeans and soyoil slumped as a lack of fresh Chinese stimulus measures sparked selling across markets.】

item.title: Vista 旗下的 Alegeus 在削减私人信贷方面遇到障碍
item.description: Alegeus 科技公司在私人信贷债务再融资方面遇到了拖延，这在历来繁忙的美国杠杆贷款市场上实属罕见。【原文：Alegeus Technologies has hit delays in refinancing private credit debt, a rare struggle for what’s been a historically busy US leveraged loan market.】

item.title: 法国银行认为奥运提振后经济疑虑增加
item.description: 法国央行的月度调查显示，由于对国内政治和地缘政治风险的担忧，9月份法国企业的不确定性上升，在奥林匹克运动会推动第三季度经济强劲增长之后，经济前景受到影响。【原文：French business uncertainty rose in September amid concerns over domestic politics and geopolitical risks, dampening the outlook for the economy after the Olympic Games drove strong third-quarter growth, the central bank’s monthly survey showed.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债券持有人签署新协议，为现金注入做准备
item.description: 随着债务谈判的进展，一些最大的泰晤士水务公司债券持有者已经签署了保密协议，以获取该公司的敏感信息。这也意味着他们不能再买卖该公司的债券。【原文：Some of the biggest Thames Water bondholders have signed non-disclosure agreements to access sensitive information about the firm as debt talks progress. That also means they can no longer trade the company’s bonds.】

item.title: 据说西班牙面包师 Europastry 考虑缩小首次公开募股规模
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙烘焙公司 Europastry SA 正在权衡是否缩小其首次公开募股计划的规模。【原文：Spanish bakery firm Europastry SA is weighing whether to reduce the size of its planned initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 核电需求增长，Cameco 希望扩建铀矿

item.title: 英国股票结算方式转变对英镑交易构成挑战
item.description: 据带头进行过渡的组织称，由于英镑的流动性低于美元，英国追随美国进入更快的股票交易制度可能会对外汇行业带来挑战。【原文：Britain’s move to follow the US into a faster equities trading regime could prove challenging for the foreign-exchange industry, given the pound is less liquid than the dollar, according to the group spearheading the transition.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia®）在华盛顿峰会上展示芯片能效
item.description: 面对人工智能计算对电力需求的担忧，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., facing concerns about the electricity demands of artificial intelligence computing, touted the energy efficiency of its latest chips at a conference Tuesday in Washington.】

item.title: 本田为修订电动汽车战略留有余地
item.description: 本田汽车公司表示，如果对纯电池汽车的需求继续减弱，该公司愿意改变其电气化路线图，这表明这家日本汽车制造商最终可能会与国际同行一样，放弃电动汽车目标。【原文：Honda Motor Co. said it’s open to altering its electrification roadmap if demand for pure battery cars continues to wane, a sign the Japanese automaker may ultimately join international peers in walking back electric vehicle targets.】

item.title: Meta 为广告商推出生成式人工智能视频工具
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在推出新的人工智能工具，以帮助广告商更轻松地创建和编辑视频，从而吸引花更多时间观看视频的 Facebook 和 Instagram 用户。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is rolling out new artificial intelligence tools to help advertisers create and edit videos more easily, seeking to reach Facebook and Instagram users who are spending more time watching videos.】

item.title: Northvolt 将面临 2,800 万美元的税单，这是财务状况的又一次考验
item.description: 10 月 14 日，Northvolt AB 将面临 2.87 亿瑞典克朗（约合 2800 万美元）的税单，这可能是这家资金短缺的电池制造商在其一个部门破产后面临的下一个财务障碍。【原文：Northvolt AB faces a 287 million Swedish kronor ($28 million) tax bill on Oct. 14, potentially the next financial hurdle for the cash-strapped battery maker after placing one of its units into bankruptcy.】

item.title: Verizon 为收购 Frontier 筹借 100 亿美元债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. has lined up $10 billion of short-term bank funding to help fund its purchase of Frontier Communications Parent Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥认为美联储不会 "大幅 "降息
item.description: 在政策制定者将联邦基金利率下调半个百分点之后，亿万富翁投资者雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）预计美联储不会 "大幅降息"。【原文：Billionaire investor Ray Dalio doesn’t anticipate the Federal Reserve making “significant cuts in rates” after policymakers slashed the federal funds rate by a half-percentage point.】

item.title: 肯尼亚连续第二次降息
item.description: 由于食品和燃料价格上涨放缓，通货膨胀率降至 12 年来的最低点，肯尼亚中央银行连续第二次下调基准利率。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the second consecutive time after inflation eased to a 12-year low on slower food and fuel price increases.】

item.title: 波兰亿万富翁索洛兹将其子开除出 Cyfrowy 董事会
item.description: 波兰亿万富翁齐格蒙特-索洛兹（Zygmunt Solorz）将其子从其媒体和移动集团 Cyfrowy Polsat SA 的监事会中解职，这是其家族争夺集团控制权的最新一幕。【原文：Polish billionaire Zygmunt Solorz dismissed his son from the supervisory board of his media and mobile group Cyfrowy Polsat SA in the latest chapter of the family feud over control of his conglomerate.】

item.title: 富达即将推出改版桌面交易平台
item.description: 富达投资（Fidelity Investments）为活跃交易者推出了全新的桌面平台，处理速度更快，外观焕然一新。【原文：Fidelity Investments is unveiling a revamped desktop platform for active traders, featuring faster processing speeds and a refreshed look.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚生态石油公司重返债券市场为债务回购融资
item.description: 哥伦比亚国有石油公司今年第二次利用国际债务市场，向投资者回购多达 12.5 亿美元的债券。【原文：Colombia’s state oil company is tapping international debt markets for the second time this year as it moves to buy back as much as $1.25 billion of bonds from investors.】

item.title: El-Erian 称债券市场 "缺乏锚定 "美联储降息路径
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）说，美联储货币政策路径的猜谜游戏正在造成市场波动。【原文：Mohamed El-Erian says that the guessing game that’s taking place over the Federal Reserve’s path for monetary policy is creating market volatility.】

item.title: 冲突不断，以色列主要机场客流量下降 43
item.description: 特拉维夫本古里安国际机场的乘客人数在 2024 年前九个月下降了 43%，原因是 10 月 7 日的袭击和随后的冲突促使航空公司撤出或减少了从该枢纽起飞的航班。【原文：Passenger numbers at Tel Aviv’s Ben Gurion International Airport fell 43% in the first nine months of 2024 as the Oct. 7 attacks and subsequent conflict prompted airlines to pull out or reduce flights from the the hub.】
